message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a scheme for estimating large-scale channel gains in a cellular system using TDD operation, UL training, and massive antenna arrays at the BSs. This involves designing non-orthogonal pilot codes and investigating their performance. This work involves aspects of information theory (cs.IT), networking and communications (cs.NI), control and systems engineering (cs.SY), multimedia (cs.MM), and machine learning (cs.LG) in terms of designing and optimizing the pilot codes.
